law.catch_line: In this subtitle the following words have the meanings indicated....

text.section: In this subtitle the following words have the meanings indicated.
"Administrator" means a person that is designated by a warrantor to be responsible for the administration of a vehicle protection product warranty.
"Division" means the Division of Consumer Protection of the Office of the Attorney General.

section.section:
"Incidental costs" means an expense that:
Is specified in a vehicle protection product warranty;
Is incurred by the warranty holder; and
Relates to the failure of a vehicle protection product to perform as provided in the vehicle protection product warranty.

"Vehicle protection product" means a vehicle protection device, system, or service that:
Is sold with a written warranty;
Is installed on or applied to a vehicle; and
Is designed to prevent loss or damage to a vehicle from a specific cause.

text.section: "Vehicle protection product warranty" means a written agreement by a warrantor that provides that if a vehicle protection product fails to prevent loss or damage to a vehicle from a specific cause, the warrantor shall pay to, or on behalf of, the warranty holder specified incidental costs incurred as a result of the failure of the vehicle protection product to perform in accordance with the terms of the vehicle protection product warranty.

section.section: "Warrantor" means a person that is contractually obligated to the warranty holder under the terms of the vehicle protection product warranty.
"Warrantor" does not include an authorized insurer that issues a warranty reimbursement insurance policy.

text.section: "Warranty holder" means a person that purchases a vehicle protection product warranty or a permitted transferee.

"Warranty reimbursement insurance policy" means a policy of insurance that is issued to a warrantor to:
Provide reimbursement to the warrantor; or
Pay on behalf of the warrantor all covered contractual obligations incurred by the warrantor under the terms and conditions of the insured vehicle protection product warranties sold by the warrantor.
